consecrated.name: Purified
consecrated.description: A holy energy fills the area

healing.name: Restorative
healing.description: A soothing energy permeates the area

calm.name: Serene
calm.description: Your mind is strangely at peace in this area

energizing.name: Vigor
energizing.description: A revitalizing energy fills the room

toxic.name: Toxicity
toxic.description: The air is thick with poisonous fumes

miasma.name: Miasma
miasma.description: An oppressive aura saps your strength and willpower

cold.name: Frigid
cold.description: A biting cold permeates the area, chilling you to the bone

evil.name: Malevolent
evil.description: A dark energy fills this room, unsettling all who enter

claustrophobic.name: Claustrophobic
claustrophobic.description: The confined space makes it hard to breathe and think clearly

catacombs: dense catacombs, walls lined with ancient tombs and sarcophagi.
fane: ancient fane. There is a lingering scent of incense. The walls are adorned with faded murals depicting long-forgotten deities.
ossuary: ancient ossuary. It is eerie and silent. Rows of skeletal remains line the walls, and a sense of unease lingers.
mortuary_garden: overgrown mortuary garden. The air is redolent with decaying flowers. Amid cracked statues and broken fountains, a sense of sorrow lingers.
phylactery: dark phylactery chamber charged with malevolent energy. The walls are adorned with ancient runes, and a sinister energy emanates from the center.
ritual_chamber: ritual chamber dense with smoke from burning candles. Carvings of dark symbols adorn the walls, and a powerful energy pulses.
dark_altar: twisted altar room overflowing with an oppressive energy. The walls are adorned with sinister engravings of cruel rituals. An irredeemable malevolence pulsates from within.
garden: serene garden, the air filled with the scent of blooming flowers. Sunlight filters through the leaves, casting dappled shadows on the ground.
cloister: quiet cloister, the sound of rustling leaves and chirping birds filling the air. The walls are covered in ivy, and a sense of peace pervades the area.
narthex: spacious narthex, the air filled with the scent of polished wood and stone. The walls are adorned with intricate carvings, and a sense of reverence hangs in the air.
praetorium: grand praetorium, the air heavy with the scent of incense and polished stone. The walls are adorned with banners and tapestries, and a sense of authority fills the space.
crypt: cold crypt whose air is heavy and still. You can hear the faint sound of dripping water.
alcove: hidden alcove, tucked away behind a crumbling wall.
secret alcove, filled with ancient artifacts and treasures.
undisturbed alcove, the air thick with dust and cobwebs.
altar: sacred altar, the air filled with the scent of incense. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
archive: dusty archive, the shelves filled with ancient scrolls and tomes. The air is thick with the scent of old paper and ink, and you can hear the faint rustling of pages.
armory: armory, the walls lined with racks of weapons and armor. The air is filled with the scent of oil and metal, and you can hear the faint clanging of blacksmiths at work.
barracks: barracks, the air filled with the scent of sweat and leather. The walls are lined with bunks and lockers, and you can hear the faint snoring of soldiers.
cell: damp cell. The walls are covered in scratches and graffiti, and the air is thick with despair.
chamber: dimly lit chamber, the walls adorned with ancient tapestries. A faint glow emanates from a mysterious artifact in the center.
corridor: corridor, the stone walls echoing your footsteps. The air is damp and musty, and you can hear distant sounds of movement.
guardroom: guardroom, the air filled with the scent of sweat and metal. The walls are lined with weapons and armor, and you can hear the faint chatter of guards.
hall: long hallway, the ceiling towering above you. The walls are lined with suits of armor and ancient weapons, and a sense of history hangs in the air.
lair: dark lair, the air thick with the scent of decay. The walls are covered in strange markings, and you can hear the faint sound of breathing.
library: dusty library, the shelves filled with ancient tomes and scrolls. The air is thick with the scent of old paper and ink, and you can hear the faint rustling of pages.
reliquary: sacred reliquary, the air filled with reverence. The walls are adorned with ancient relics and artifacts, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
sanctum: hidden sanctum, the air thick with mystery. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
scriptorium: quiet scriptorium, the air filled with the scent of parchment and ink. The walls are lined with desks and quills, and you can hear the faint scratching of pens.
shrine: sacred shrine, the air filled with reverence. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols and offerings, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
study: quiet study, the air filled with the scent of old books and leather. The walls are lined with shelves of knowledge, and you can hear the faint scratching of quills.
tavern: bustling tavern filled with the scent of ale and roasted meat. The air is thick with laughter and the clinking of mugs.
throne_room: grand throne room, the walls lined with towering pillars and the floor covered in intricate mosaics. A majestic throne sits at the far end, guarded by a fearsome creature.
treasury: glittering treasury, the walls lined with shelves of gold and jewels. The air is thick with the scent of wealth and power, and you can hear the faint clinking of coins.
vault: secure vault, the air heavy with the scent of old wood and metal. The walls are lined with locked chests and safes, and you can hear the faint ticking of hidden mechanisms.
watchtower: watchtower, the air crisp and cold. The walls are lined with windows offering a panoramic view of the surrounding landscape, and you can hear the faint sound of birds.

death_shrine.name: dark favor
death_shrine.description: A dark altar dedicated to a forgotten death god. Candles flicker with cold flames. A sense of eerie calm fills the area.

status.name: Death's Favor
status.description: You feel a dark power coursing through you, enhancing your combat abilities.

memorial_shrine.name: healing memory
memorial_shrine.description: A shrine to the honored dead. Fresh flowers somehow still bloom here. You feel a soothing warmth in the air.

sealed_sarcophagus.name: ancient treasure
sealed_sarcophagus.description: An ornate sarcophagus sealed with wax and ancient binding runes. There is a faint aura of necrotic energy surrounding it.

pure_fountain.name: font blessing
pure_fountain.description: A pristine fountain bubbles in the center of the room. The water looks crystal clear.

polluted_fountain.name: font blessing
polluted_fountain.description: A fountain graces the center of the room. The water looks murky.

temple: #race + " heretics serve a dark master at their fane deep in the " + #terrain
#race + " cultists have been spotted close to a hidden shrine " + #direction + " of us"
#bossName + " is hiding in a secret sanctum " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " is holed up in a sacred reliquary to the " + #direction + " of town"
fortress: #race + " raiders have been sighted near the fort " + #direction + " of here"
"an army of " + #race + "s was observed near the ancient " + #dungeon_type
#bossName + " is holed up in a fortress " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " leads a band of " + #race + "s in a stronghold " + #direction + " of here"
library: #race + "s have been spotted in close proximity to a reliquary " + #direction + " of town"
#race + " scholars have been hoarding forbidden knowledge in a secret library"
#bossName + " is said to be hiding in a hidden archive " + #direction + " of here"
'travelers speak of ' + #bossName + ' and their ' + #race + ' cult seeking a hidden scriptorium'
tomb: "watch out for " + #race + "s lurking in the " + #direction + "ern necropolis"
"the catacombs have been taken over by " + #race + "s"
#race + "s have been seen revelling in a haunted tomb " + #direction + " of our location"
#bossName + " is said to be hiding in a secret crypt " + #direction + " of here"
mine: "the old delve just " + #direction + " of town is now home to a tribe of " + #race + "s"
#race + "s occupy an abandoned mine " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " is hiding in a hidden cavern " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " is said to be holed up in a secret lair in the " + #direction
